summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: the ExperienceSection header no longer renders any calendar/date-range UI block, while role/company/location still render. However, the diff summary also indicates several unrelated frontend changes (and even CV data changes) that were explicitly out of scope/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested change to footer attribution/closing message in App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to removing the Experience date-range block only; no footer/app copy changes were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested modifications to CV data content and ContactData type (email/LinkedIn/Google Drive link changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly state: "Do not change any CV data content in frontend/src/data/cv.ts."

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested changes to TopNav branding/logo and navigation behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest forbids adding/changing features outside removing the specified Experience date block.
Not requested; outside the scope of removing the Experience date block.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested global styling/theme changes (colors, fonts, shadows, smooth scroll).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside the scope of removing the Experience date block.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested Contact section label change (Google Drive label).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside the scope of removing the Experience date block.
